inspirationalQuotes.text: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
inspirationalQuotes.author: William Osler

inspirationalQuotes.text: Wherever the art of Medicine is loved, there is also a love of Humanity.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Hippocrates

inspirationalQuotes.text: The chapter you are learning today is going to save someone's life tomorrow. Pay attention.
inspirationalQuotes.author: Unknown

paretoBanner.title: Master the 20%
paretoBanner.description: Focus on the 20% of topics that appear in 80% of your exams. Let's conquer them together.

questionOfTheDay.question: A 55-year-old male presents with crushing chest pain. ECG shows ST-segment elevation in leads II, III, and aVF. Which coronary artery is most likely occluded?

subjects.name: Anatomy
subjects.description: Anatomy is the branch of biology concerned with the study of the structure of organisms and their parts.

histology.title: Histology: A Text and Atlas With Correlated Cell and Molecular Biology
histology.author: 6th Edition

atlases.title: Anatomy 360 - The Ultimate Visual Guide to the Human Body

subjects.name: Physiology
subjects.description: Physiology is the scientific study of functions and mechanisms in a living system.

subjects.name: Biochemistry
subjects.description: Biochemistry is the study of chemical processes within and relating to living organisms.

subjects.name: Pathology
subjects.description: Pathology is the study of the causes and effects of disease or injury.

subjects.name: Pharmacology
subjects.description: Pharmacology is the science of drug action on biological systems.

subjects.name: Microbiology
subjects.description: Microbiology is the scientific study of microorganisms, those being unicellular, multicellular, or acellular.

subjects.name: Forensic Medicine
subjects.description: Forensic medicine is a branch of medicine that applies medical knowledge to legal questions.

subjects.name: Community Medicine
subjects.description: Community medicine is a branch of medicine that is concerned with the health of the members of a community, municipality, or region.

subjects.name: ENT
subjects.description: Otorhinolaryngology is a surgical subspecialty within medicine that deals with the surgical and medical management of conditions of the head and neck.

subjects.name: Ophthalmology
subjects.description: Ophthalmology is a branch of medicine that deals with the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of diseases of the eye and visual system.

subjects.name: General Medicine
subjects.description: General medicine is the medical specialty dedicated to the diagnosis and medical treatment of adults.

subjects.name: General Surgery
subjects.description: General surgery is a surgical specialty that focuses on abdominal contents including esophagus, stomach, small intestine, large intestine, liver, pancreas, gallbladder, appendix and bile ducts, and often the thyroid gland.

subjects.name: OBG
subjects.description: Obstetrics and gynaecology is the medical specialty that encompasses the two subspecialties of obstetrics and gynaecology.

subjects.name: Pediatrics
subjects.description: Pediatrics is the branch of medicine that involves the medical care of infants, children, and adolescents.

subjects.name: Orthopedics
subjects.description: Orthopedics is the branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the musculoskeletal system.

subjects.name: Radiology
subjects.description: Radiology is the medical discipline that uses medical imaging to diagnose and treat diseases within the bodies of animals and humans.

subjects.name: Anesthesiology
subjects.description: Anesthesiology, anaesthesiology, or anaesthesia is the medical specialty concerned with the total perioperative care of patients before, during and after surgery. It encompasses anesthesia, intensive care medicine, critical emergency medicine, and pain medicine.

subjects.name: Psychiatry
subjects.description: Psychiatry is the medical specialty devoted to the diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of mental disorders. These include various maladaptations related to mood, behaviour, cognition, and perceptions.

subjects.name: Dermatology
subjects.description: Dermatology is the branch of medicine dealing with the skin. It is a specialty with both medical and surgical aspects.
